mapper.insert: insert into m_pricing values (#{buyerCd}, #{productCd}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{price}, #{currency}, #{discountrate}, sysdate, 'N', null)
mapper.select: select count(*) from m_pricing where del='N'
mapper.update: update m_pricing set del='Y', statusdate = sysdate where buyer_cd = #{buyerCd} and product_cd = #{productCd} and startdate = #{startdate} and enddate = #{enddate}

update m_pricing set price = #{price}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, discountrate = #{discountrate}, currency = #{currency}, statusdate = sysdate where buyer_cd = #{buyerCd} and product_cd = #{productCd} and startdate = #{startdate} and enddate = #{enddate}
